jchess.common

Interface IPositionAgent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IPosition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PositionAgent

    public interface IPositionAgent
extends IPosition
    IPositionAgent provides interface for the module where the all the decisions (game) are taken. It ensures that user does not make any changes to underlying data object.
    Since:
    7 Dec 2019
    Author:
    Sajad Karim
